Title: Relates to used motor vehicle dealer education
Summary: Establishes used motor vehicle dealer training programs to educate dealers on topics such as consumer protection and sales and use tax collection; permits trade organizations to apply to conduct training programs.
LawCode: Add ยง419-b, V & T L; add ยง99-rr, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the state finance law, in relation to used motor vehicle dealer education
